Grab the colorful and capable tablet for only $54.99

Amazon has a whole batch of highly capable Fire Tablets that let you stream, game, check emails, video chat, and more. From the Fire Max 11 with its massive screen to the compact Amazon Fire HD 8, these devices make great gifts for just about anyone on your list.

In October, a new model of the Amazon Fire HD 8 was released, and we’re already seeing impressive discounts on the tablet during the Amazon Black Friday sale. It's the perfect size for portability, while still providing a one-stop shop for entertainment. The 32GB model is an absolute steal right now, setting you back only $54. That’s $45 off the list price, or you can always grab the 64GB model for more storage.

Save $45 on the Amazon Fire HD 8

Why choose (or upgrade to) the newest model?

The latest model of the Amazon Fire HD 8 is a slight refresh of the 2022 model. It still features that same lightweight design and compact size, making for a perfect on-the-go companion. The Hexa-core 2.0 GHz processor with 3 GB RAM is an upgrade, bringing quicker app launches, a 13-hour battery life, and support for three new handy AI smart tools helping with productivity and creativity. Whether you’re streaming movies or TV shows, scrolling the web, reading, or gaming, the display is bright and colorful. This device has even been made more sustainably, so you can have better peace of mind when making this purchase.

Amazon's Trade-in Program Featured 20% Discount

If you’re looking to save even more money on a Fire Tablet, Amazon offers a program to trade in your older Amazon and non-Amazon electronics, like tablets, smart speakers, streaming sticks, and more. In addition to receiving an Amazon gift card for the appraised value of the item, you’ll receive a 20% discount on a new Fire Tablet. Terms and conditions apply, but if you’re looking to get some older devices that are just collecting dust off your hands, this a great option. Details here.

Should I Wait Until Cyber Monday to Buy?

Many of the best Black Friday deals should last until Cyber Monday on December 2nd, but there isn’t any reason to wait to make a purchase, as you can expect the savings to be similar during the entire deal period. If you wait too long, the Amazon Fire HD 8 could sell out.
